Title: Introduce optional timeouts for idle client sessions
Rely on the JVM to handle OutOfMemoryErrors
More frequent commitlog chained markers
Improve wording around partitioner selection
Remove unused max_value_size_in_mb config setting
Correct and clarify SSLFactory.getSslContext method and call site
Change default start_native_transport to true and remove from jvm.options
Allow to skip overlapings checks
SSL Cert Hot Reloading should check for sanity of the new keystore/truststore before loading it
Make PeriodicCommitLogService.blockWhenSyncLagsNanos configurable
Add ability to specify driver name and version
Auto-expand replication_factor for NetworkTopologyStrategy
Make repair coordination less expensive by moving MerkleTrees off heap
Remove dependencies on JVM internals for JMX support
Eliminate background repair and probablistic read_repair_chance table option
Add specialized IndexRegistry for offline tools/clients
Yaml comments: data_file_directories distributes data evenly by partitioning its token ranges.
Add storage port options to sstableloader
Stream entire SSTables when possible
Fix SimpleStrategy option validation
Clean up parsing speculative retry params from string
Parallelize initial materialized view build
Fix imbalanced disks when replacing node with same address with JBOD
Better document in code InetAddressAndPort usage post 7544
Bump SSTable level instead of rewriting SSTable completely during single-sstable compactions
Add network auth
Allow storage port to be configurable per nodePatch
Prevent client requests from blocking on executor task queue
Round buffer size to powers of 2 for the chunk cache
Add option to sanity check tombstones on reads/compaction
Detect inconsistencies in repaired data on the read path
Add 'nodetool getbatchlogreplaythrottle' and 'nodetool setbatchlogreplaythrottle
Use an ExecutorService for repair commands instead of new Thread(..).start()
Allow using custom script for chronicle queue BinLog archival
Disable old native protocol versions on demand
Reduce heap pressure during compactions
Avoid leaking threads when remote nodes fail anticompaction and rate limit anticompactions
Startup checker should wait for count rather than percentage
Fix comparison of address and port for repair and messages
Delete temp test files on exit
Throttle base partitions during MV repair streaming to prevent OOM
Remove Netty timed batching and instead do the batch during next eventLoop invocation after a write has been enqueued.
Correctly set repaired data tracking flag on range commands
Improve config validation and documentation on overflow and NPE
Do not enable native transport if bootstrap is pending
Add JMX query support for diagnostic events
Support a means of logging all queries as they were invoked.
Avoid assertion error when IndexSummary > 2G
Protect against overflow of local expiration time
Delay hints store excise by write timeout to avoid race with decommission
Improve merkle tree size and time on heap
Disable immediate flusher by default for cassandra-3.0 and cassandra-3.11
Add optional startup delay to wait until peers are ready
Add flag to disable materialized views, and warnings on creation
Avoid using DatabaseDescriptor in ProtocolVersion
Partitioned outbound internode TCP connections can occur when nodes restart
Add sstableloader OPTION to accept target keyspace name
Fix assorted gossip races and add related runtime checks
Add option to optimize Merkle tree comparison across replicas
Make CONTENT_CHECKSUM protocol OPTION values case insensitive
Allow to set batch_size_warn_threshold_in_kb via JMX
Automatic sstable upgrades
force minumum timeout value
Migrate dtests to use pytest and python3
Improve commit log chain marker updating
ZSTD Compressor support in Cassandra
Remove unused and deprecated methods from AbstractCompactionStrategy
ReplicaCollection follow-up
Add flag to disable SASI indexes, and warning on creation
Validate supported column type with SASI analyzer
Deprecate background repair and probablistic read_repair_chance table option
Add flag to allow dropping oversized read repair mutations
Introduce in-jvm distributed tests
Add GroupCommitLogService
Audit log allows system keyspaces to be audited via configuration options
Audit logging for database activity
Transient Replication and Cheap Quorums
Add fqltool comparePatch by marcuse
Only optimize large ranges when figuring out where to stream from
lean up all javadoc related errors
Backport ImmediateFlusher to cassandra-3.0 and cassandra-3.11
ninja: Fix "No newline at end of file" in c*.yaml
